full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Services Needed
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking professional services for Informatics Professional Services (SPICT) GSIN: D302A ADP System Development Services to maintain and upgrade the PeopleSoft application.

## Contract Information
* **Reference Number:** 01B68-22-0067
* **Solicitation Number:** 01B68-22-0067
* **Publication Date:** January 18, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 13, 2023 12:00 PM EST

## Description of Work
Provide expert services to maintain and upgrade the PeopleSoft application to meet AAFC's business requirements and align with the Government of Canada's Next Generation Human Resources and Pay direction.

## Evaluation Criteria
Quotations will be evaluated based on the supplier's experience and qualifications in peopleSoft functional and technical resources.

## Invitation to Bidders
A list of qualified suppliers has been invited to submit a proposal.

## Solicitation Details
This request is open only to TBIPS suppliers who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories: PeopleSoft Functional and Technical Resources.

## Solicitation Method
Competitive Bidding

## Security Clearance
The contract requires a secret security clearance.

## Evaluation Method
The evaluation will be based on the supplier's experience, qualifications, and technical ability to complete the work.

**Important Dates:**

*   **Closing Date:** February 13, 2023 12:00 PM EST
*   **Estimated Delivery Date:** March 31, 2024
*   **Duration of Contract:** Until a separate multi-year procurement vehicle is completed

**Contact Information:**

*   **Contact Name:** Rhonda DiMarco
*   **Contact Email:** [rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca](mailto:rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone:** 613-773-0934
